summary: Interstellar expedition manned by "pioneers" (Soviet Scouts) reach Alpha Kassiopea to find that smart robots have taken control of the whole planet. Their only goal: to make their masters ... See full summary Â»
cast: Misha Yershov|Aleksandr Grigoryev|Vladimir Savin|Vladimir Basov Ml.|Olga Bityukova|Vadim Ledogorov|Irina Savina|Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy|Igor Ledogorov|Lev Durov|Nikolay Abrashin|Anatoliy Adoskin|Yevgeniy Doroshin|Natalya Fateeva|Aleksandr Lenkov|Yuriy Medvedev|Pyotr Merkurev|Artur Nishchyonkin|Nadezhda Ovcharova|Nikolay Pogodin|Raisa Ryazanova|Semyon Safonov|Nadezhda Sementsova|Vladimir Shiryaev|Olga Soshnikova|Aleksandr Vigdorov|Nelli Vitepash|Mikhail Yanushkevich|Aleksandr Yanvaryov|Mikhail Yeremeyev|Aleksandr Zimin|Boris Gitin|Arkadi Markov
title: Otroki vo vselennoy
